title: Digital Qur'an v3
description:
Digital Qur'an [Quran, Koran] v3 by Sony Sugema, Indonesia

Description:
Excellent software, good sounds, nice tarjamah.

This is a Windows application [98, ME, 2000, XP, Vista]. Once installed, you can see ayat written in Arabic, the translation [English or Bahasa Indonesia], and at the same time you can hear the sounds reading ayat. Also included an interactive multimedia for learning Tajwid [proper pronunciation during recitation].

It has features such as browsing and searching certain ayat, copying ayat as picture and exporting ayat to html.

There are 25 languages available to use during instalation, which are Afrikaans, Albanian, Basque, Bosnian, BrazilianPortuguese, Catalan, Danish, English, Dutch, Estonian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Luxemburgish, Malaysian, Norwegian, Portuguese, Romanian, Spanish, Swedish and Thai.


Installation instructions:
1. After download finished, scan it with antivirus to make sure it's clean (and make you feel comfortable)
2. Run Setup, choose your language and follow step by step instruction.
3. There will be a shortcut at StartMenu and Desktop.


More information:
There's one unofficial site you may want to visit, http://digital-quran-v3.blogspot.com


Acknowledgement:
This good software was originally developed by Mr. Sony Sugema, copyright belongs to him. You may reach him at http://www.sonysugema.com
